_header: This ender year I heard be told
_description: Robert Henryson, ‘Bludy Serk’ — fifteen eight-line tail-rhyme stanzas

Banna.First Lines:
This hindir ȝeir I hard be taldThair was a worthy
                    king…
Banna.Last Lines:
…ffor his lufe þat bocht ws deirThink on þe bludy
                    serk
Banna.Note:
Treated as one of Henryson’s Fables, interrupting the segments of
                    Fables in this MS and having for title in left margin, added by later hand,
                    ‘Fable VII. The bludy Sark’ (f. 325).
Banna.Attributed Title: The bludy Sark (added by later hand, f. 325)
